main.name: Piotr Dudek
main.description: Web Developer leveraging project management and compliance background to build web applications and create the ultimate user experience
main.bio: Full-Stack Web Developer leveraging project management and compliance background to build web applications and create the ultimate user experience. Recently obtained a Certificate in Full Stack Web Development from Columbia University with strong technical skills in JavaScript, CSS, HTML, React.js, and responsive web design as well as a passion for learning emerging technologies.
main.contactmessage: Contact me to find out how we can work together

resume.skillmessage: Here is a list of my strongest technical skills

education.school: Columbia University City of New York
education.description: Six month intensive Full Stack Course : HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Express.js, React.js, Database Theory, MongoDB, MySQL, Command Line, Git, and more.
Developed a critical awareness of the relationship between Jews and Christians and learned to address complex religious, ethical and social issues to promote justice and peace.
Gained knowledge necessary to work in various positions that require the understanding of international legal regulations and their practical application.

work.title: Project Manager
work.description: Enhanced company efficacy by implementing new PM software and revising operating procedures, which resulted in timely and cost-effective product launches. Successfully led the Quality Management Team at the Annual ISO Inspections, improving results by 100% for two consecutive years and earning recognition for developing a cutting-edge internal audit program.

projects.title: Kakeibo
projects.category: The Kakeibo app monitors how much you are spending on streaming services.

projects.title: Google Books Search
projects.category: This React app allows users to search for hundreds of thousands of book titles from all over the world through Google Books API.

projects.title: Employee Connect
projects.category: This app allows you to search, sort, and filter your employee information.

projects.title: Balance Pro 2.0
projects.category: Balance Pro 2.0 is a progressive web app (PWA) that gives users the freedom of tracking their withdrawals and deposits with or without an Internet connection.

testimonials.text: Piotr and I worked together on the same team and I always admired him for his work ethic, professionalism and intelligence. He has excellent management skills and always goes the extra mile to accomplish what needs to be done. Piotr is dedicated, a hard worker and is an asset to the team.
